name: LunchRecommender
0:
”Alexa, ask lunch recommender what should i eat today”
”Alexa, ask lunch recommender where should i go for lunch”
”Alexa, ask lunch recommender what's a good lunch option”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lunch recommender
des: Have you ever had trouble deciding where to go for lunch? Have you ever been faced with decision fatigue because there are just too many choices? Fear no more! Lunch Recommender is here to save the day. Just ask where to go, and it will recommend a choice for you. Let it do the heavy thinking so you don't have to.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
